nánhái boy

traditional: 不備
bùbèi unprepared; off guard

traditional: 備件
bèijiàn spare parts

traditional: 備戰
bèizhàn prepare for war; be prepared against war

traditional: 備料
bèiliào get the materials ready; prepare feed (for livestock)

traditional: 備用
bèiyòng reserve; spare; alternate; backup

traditional: 備至
bèizhì to the utmost; in every possible way

traditional: 完備
wánbèi perfect; complete
wánběi faultless; complete; perfect; to leave nothing to be desired

traditional: 戰備
zhànbèi war preparation

traditional: 設備
shèbèi equipment; facilities; installations

traditional: 國歌
guógē national anthem
shāngē folk song; mountain song

traditional: 歌聲
gēshēng singing voice; fig. original voice of a poet
míngē folk song

traditional: 四人幫

bānggōng help with farm work; helper

bāngbàn assist in managing; deputy

hòuxuǎnrén candidate

dàoshíhòu when the moment comes; at that time

wènhòu to give one's respects; to send a greeting

xiǎoqìhòu microclimate; fig. local situation

shíhou time; length of time; moment; period
shíhòu time

traditional: 氣候
qìhòu climate; atmosphere; situation
děnghòu waiting
qīngchú eliminate; get rid of
jiěchú to remove; to relieve (sb of their duties); to free; to get rid of; to lift (an embargo)

traditional: 開除
kāichú to expel

chúwài to exclude; not including sth (when counting or listing); except for

traditional: 除數
chúshù divider

chúfǎ division (math.)
chúfēi only if (..., or otherwise, ...); only when; only in the case that

gèjiè all walks of life; all social circles
dìjiè abuttals
